stimulusHtml: Suppose that a countryâ€™s nominal gross domestic product (GDP) was $1,000 in year 1 and $2,000 in year 2. If year 1 is the base year and real (GDP) in year 2 was $1,000, which of the following is true?
choicesHtml: Prices fell by 50% between year 1 and year 2.
Prices remained the same between year 1 and year 2.
More goods and services were produced in year 2 than in year 1.
Fewer goods and services were produced in year 2 than in year 1.
